sys_hub_flow.name: FikaNow2 Item Request

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Request Item
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_86e57b292fd715102eab837cf699b6e2

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Table Name
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_86e57b292fd715102eab837cf699b6e2

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ask for Approval from the FikaNow Approver Group (member: Fred Luddy)
Set Requested Item Record State to Closed Complete
Enter the fika request in the Item Request table and set State to Pending
Send email to Requester that the request has been rejected

sys_element_mapping.value: Sorry Trigger➛...➛Name, it looks like your request for fika has been rejected... Sorry about that :-(
Bad news, your fika request ﻿{{f684831e-eef1-4644-a15f-d1bf1e38074d.record.number}} has been rejected...﻿

Dear supplier of fika, below is an order for some of your amazing stuff to brighten our day.
Please fulfill it to the fullest and let us enjoy the fruits of your labour. 
 
Order details
Item Description: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Description
Quantity: Trigger➛...➛Quantity
Est. delivery: Trigger➛...➛Estimated delivery
Due Date: Trigger➛...➛Due date
Additional Comments: Trigger➛...➛Additional comments

 

By the way, if you have any questions feel free to email me back at 1 - Update Record➛...➛Email and make sure to include this reference number for me: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number so I instantly know what it is about.

 

Best regards and yours truly, Trigger➛...➛Name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Set Request Record State to Closed Complete (since it was rejected)
Send email to Requester that the request has been registered

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Name, you´re request for fika is on its way.

First it just has to be approved by any member of the Fika Approver Group members - Inget är som väntans tider!

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Assign Deliver Fika task to Fika Client Task Assignees Group (member: Beth Anglin)

sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_0a863b692fd715102eab837cf699b64a

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Set Request Record State to Closed Complete (since it was rejected)
Ask for Approval from the FikaNow Approver Group (member: Fred Luddy)
Send email to Requester that the request has been rejected

sys_element_mapping.value: Sorry Trigger➛...➛Name, it looks like your request for fika has been rejected... Sorry about that :-(
Bad news, your fika request ﻿{{f684831e-eef1-4644-a15f-d1bf1e38074d.record.number}} has been rejected...﻿

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Assign Deliver Fika task to Fika Client Task Assignees Group (member: Beth Anglin)
Enter the fika request in the Item Request table and set State to Pending
Send email to Requester that the request has been registered

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Name, you´re request for fika is on its way.

First it just has to be approved by any member of the Fika Approver Group members - Inget är som väntans tider!

Dear supplier of fika, below is an order for some of your amazing stuff to brighten our day.
Please fulfill it to the fullest and let us enjoy the fruits of your labour. 
 
Order details
Item Description: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Description
Quantity: Trigger➛...➛Quantity
Est. delivery: Trigger➛...➛Estimated delivery
Due Date: Trigger➛...➛Due date
Additional Comments: Trigger➛...➛Additional comments

 

By the way, if you have any questions feel free to email me back at 1 - Update Record➛...➛Email and make sure to include this reference number for me: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number so I instantly know what it is about.

 

Best regards and yours truly, Trigger➛...➛Name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Set Requested Item Record State to Closed Complete
